00020 
00021 using System;
00022 using System.Collections;
00023 
00024 using Niry;
00025 using Niry.Utils;
00026 using Niry.Network;
00027 
00028 using NyFolder;
00029 using NyFolder.Utils;
00030 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00031 
00032 namespace NyFolder.Protocol {
00034     public static class DownloadManager {
00035         // ============================================
00036         // PUBLIC Events
00037         // ============================================
00039         public static event BlankEventHandler ReceivedPart = null;
00041         public static event BlankEventHandler Finished = null;
00043         public static event BlankEventHandler Aborted = null;
00045         public static event BlankEventHandler Added = null;
00046 
00047         // ============================================
00048         // PRIVATE Members
00049         // ============================================
00050         private static FileList acceptList = null;
00051         private static FileList recvList = null;
00052         private static int numDownloads = 0;
00053 
00054         // ============================================
00055         // PUBLIC (Init/Clear) Methods
00056         // ============================================
00058         public static void Initialize() {
00059             // Create Thread-Safe File Lists Instances
00060             acceptList = new FileList();
00061             recvList = new FileList();
00062         }
00063 
00065         public static void Clear() {
00066             acceptList.RemoveAll();
00067             recvList.RemoveAll();
00068         }
00069 
00070         // ============================================
00071         // PUBLIC Methods
00072         // ============================================
00074         public static void Accept  (PeerSocket peer, uint id, 
00075                                     string path, string saveAs) 
00076         {
00077             FileReceiver fileRecv = new FileReceiver(id, peer, path, saveAs);
00078             acceptList.Add(peer, fileRecv);
00079 
00080             // Raise Added Event
00081             if (Added != null) Added(fileRecv);
00082         }
00083 
00085         public static void InitDownload (PeerSocket peer, uint id, XmlRequest xml) {
00086             FileReceiver fileRecv = new FileReceiver(id);
00087             if ((fileRecv = (FileReceiver) acceptList.Search(peer, fileRecv)) == null) {
00088                 ArrayList files = acceptList.GetFiles(peer);
00089 
00090                 string name = (string) xml.Attributes["name"];
00091                 foreach (FileReceiver fRecv in files) {
00092                     if (fRecv.OriginalName == name) {
00093                         fileRecv = fRecv;
00094                         break;
00095                     }
00096                 }
00097             }
00098             acceptList.Remove(peer, fileRecv);
00099             fileRecv.Id = id;
00100             recvList.Add(peer, fileRecv);
00101             fileRecv.Init(xml);
00102         }
00103 
00105         public static void GetFilePart (PeerSocket peer, uint id, XmlRequest xml) {
00106             FileReceiver fileRecv = new FileReceiver(id);
00107             fileRecv = (FileReceiver) recvList.Search(peer, fileRecv);
00108             fileRecv.AddPart(xml);
00109 
00110             // Raise Received Event
00111             if (ReceivedPart != null) ReceivedPart(fileRecv);
00112         }
00113 
00115         public static void AbortDownload (PeerSocket peer, uint id) {
00116             FileReceiver fileRecv = new FileReceiver(id);
00117             if ((fileRecv = (FileReceiver) acceptList.Search(peer, fileRecv)) != null) {
00118                 acceptList.Remove(peer, fileRecv);
00119             } else {
00120                 recvList.Remove(peer, fileRecv);
00121             }
00122             fileRecv.Abort();
00123 
00124             // Raise Aborted Event
00125             if (Aborted != null) Aborted(fileRecv);
00126         }
00127 
00129         public static void FinishedDownload (PeerSocket peer, uint id) {
00130             FileReceiver fileRecv = new FileReceiver(id);
00131             fileRecv = (FileReceiver) recvList.Search(peer, fileRecv);
00132             fileRecv.Save();
00133             recvList.Remove(peer, fileRecv);
00134 
00135             // Raise Finished Event
00136             if (Finished != null) Finished(fileRecv);
00137         }
00138 
00139         // ============================================
00140         // PRIVATE (Methods) Event Handlers
00141         // ============================================
00142 
00143         // ============================================
00144         // PRIVATE Methods
00145         // ============================================
00146 
00147         // ============================================
00148         // PUBLIC Properties
00149         // ============================================
00151         public static int NDownloads {
00152             get { return(numDownloads); }
00153         }
00154 
00156         public static FileList AcceptList {
00157             get { return(acceptList); }
00158         }
00159         
00161         public static FileList ReceivingList {
00162             get { return(recvList); }
00163         }
00164     }
00165 }
